title: Retail Boutique - Graf Center for Integrative Medicine | Englewood Health
description: The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine sells a variety of products to support your journey to wellness.
cleaned_text: Retail Boutique In addition to services, we sell a variety of products to support your journey to wellness, including: - Yoga supplies (mats, clothing, blocks, socks, etc.) - Aromatherapy (oils, diffusers, etc.) - Vitamins and supplements - Quotable gift cards, local artists natural products - Organic skincare products - Natural mother/baby products We accept major credit cards and we also sell gift certificates.
